verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> vai-yis-Sa lifted up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> 'ei-Nav, his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> vai-yaR and looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold עֵשָׂ֣ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav and behold Esau בָּ֔א <WH935> Ba, came וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> ve-'im-Mo with אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' and with him four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; men וַיַּ֣חַץ <WH2673> vai-Ya-chatz And he divided אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיְלָדִ֗ים <WH3206> hay-la-Dim, the children עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- among לֵאָה֙ <WH3812> le-'Ah unto Leah וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- among רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> ra-Chel, and unto Rachel וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> ve-'Al among שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> she-Tei and unto the two הַשְּׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8198> hash-she-fa-Chot. handmaids

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <WH8198> hash-she-fa-Chot the handmaids וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <WH3206> yal-dei-Hen and their children רִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> ri-sho-Nah; foremost וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et לֵאָ֤ה <WH3812> le-'Ah and Leah וִֽילָדֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3206> vi-la-Dei-ha and her children אַחֲרֹנִ֔ים <WH314> 'a-cha-ro-Nim, after וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רָחֵ֥ל <WH7354> ra-Chel and Rachel וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yo-Sef and Joseph אַחֲרֹנִֽים׃ <WH314> 'a-cha-ro-Nim. hindermost

וְה֖וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu himself עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> 'a-Var And he passed over לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem; before them וַיִּשְׁתַּ֤חוּ <WH7812> vai-yish-Ta-chu and bowed himself אַ֙רְצָה֙ <WH776> 'ar-tzah to the ground שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim, times עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until גִּשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH5066> gish-To until he came near עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> 'a-Chiv. to his brother

וַיָּ֨רָץ <WH7323> vai-Ya-rotz ran עֵשָׂ֤ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav And Esau לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <WH7125> lik-ra-To to meet him וַֽיְחַבְּקֵ֔הוּ <WH2263> vay-chab-be-Ke-hu, and embraced וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol him and fell עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on צַוָּארָ֖ו <WH6677> tzav-va-Rav on his neck וַׅיִּׅשָּׁׅקֵ֑ׅהׅוּׅ <WH5401> vai-yish-sha-Ke-hu; and kissed him וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <WH1058> vai-yiv-Ku. and they wept

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> vai-yis-Sa And he lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> 'ei-Nav, his eyes וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar and saw אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> han-na-Shim the women וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> hay-la-Dim, and the children וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said מִי־ <WH4310> mi- Who אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh Who [are] those לָּ֑ךְ Lach; וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar with thee;And he said הַיְלָדִ֕ים <WH3206> hay-la-Dim The children אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom חָנַ֥ן <WH2603> cha-Nan hath graciously given אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him which God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha. thy servant

וַתִּגַּ֧שְׁןָ <WH5066> vat-tig-Gash-na came near הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <WH8198> hash-she-fa-Chot Then the handmaidens הֵ֥נָּה <WH2007> Hen-nah with וְיַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <WH3206> ve-yal-dei-Hen they and their children וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶֽיןָ׃ <WH7812> vat-Tish-ta-cha-Vei-na. and they bowed themselves

וַתִּגַּ֧שׁ <WH5066> vat-tig-Gash came near גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- likewise לֵאָ֛ה <WH3812> le-'Ah And Leah וִילָדֶ֖יהָ <WH3206> vi-la-Dei-ha also with her children וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֑וּ <WH7812> vai-yish-ta-cha-Vu; and bowed themselves וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char, and after נִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> nig-Gash near יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> yo-Sef Joseph וְרָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> ve-ra-Chel and Rachel וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֽוּ׃ <WH7812> vai-Yish-ta-cha-Vu. and they bowed

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said מִ֥י <WH4310> mi What לְךָ֛ le-Cha כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh What [meanest] thou by all this drove הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which פָּגָ֑שְׁתִּי <WH6298> pa-Ga-she-ti; which I met וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer ;And he said לִמְצֹא־ <WH4672> lim-tzo- [These are] to find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> chen grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> 'a-do-Ni. of my lord

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav And Esau יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- I have לִ֣י li רָ֑ב <WH7227> Rav; enough אָחִ֕י <WH251> 'a-Chi my brother יְהִ֥י <WH1961> ye-Hi have לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, And Jacob אַל־ <WH408> 'al- No נָא֙ <WH4994> na please אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if נָ֨א <WH4994> na now מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> ma-Tza-ti Nay I pray thee if now I have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> chen grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thy sight וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta then receive מִנְחָתִ֖י <WH4503> min-cha-Ti my present מִיָּדִ֑י <WH3027> mi-ya-Di; at my hand כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> ken after that רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti for therefore I have seen פָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> fa-Nei-cha, thy face כִּרְאֹ֛ת <WH7200> kir-'Ot as though I had seen פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei the face אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God וַתִּרְצֵֽנִי׃ <WH7521> vat-tir-Tze-ni. and thou wast pleased with me

קַח־ <WH3947> kach- Take נָ֤א <WH4994> na Please אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּרְכָתִי֙ <WH1293> bir-cha-Ti I pray thee my blessing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֻבָ֣את <WH935> hu-Vat that is brought לָ֔ךְ Lach, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because חַנַּ֥נִי <WH2603> chan-Na-ni hath dealt graciously with me אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him to thee because God וְכִ֣י <WH3588> ve-Chi and because יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- I have לִי־ li- כֹ֑ל <WH3605> Chol; enough וַיִּפְצַר־ <WH6484> vai-yif-tzar- And he urged בּ֖וֹ bo וַיִּקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach. him and he took

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said נִסְעָ֣ה <WH5265> nis-'Ah Let us take our journey וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <WH1980> ve-ne-Le-chah; and go וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> ve-'e-le-Chah will go לְנֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5048> le-neg-De-cha. before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him אֲדֹנִ֤י <WH113> 'a-do-Ni unto him My lord יֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> yo-De-a' knoweth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that הַיְלָדִ֣ים <WH3206> hay-la-Dim that the children רַכִּ֔ים <WH7390> rak-Kim, [are] tender וְהַצֹּ֥אן <WH6629> ve-hatz-Tzon and the flocks וְהַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> ve-hab-ba-Kar and herds עָל֣וֹת <WH5763> a-Lot with young עָלָ֑י <WH5921> 'a-Lai; care וּדְפָקוּם֙ <WH1849> u-de-fa-Kum [are] with me and if men should overdrive י֣וֹם <WH3117> Yom day אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, them one וָמֵ֖תוּ <WH4191> va-Me-tu will die כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> hatz-Tzon. all the flock

יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> ya-'a-vor- I pray thee pass over נָ֥א <WH4994> na Please אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> 'a-do-Ni Let my lord לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> av-Do; his servant וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> va-'a-Ni and I אֶֽתְנָהֲלָ֣ה <WH5095> 'et-na-ha-Lah and I will lead on לְאִטִּ֗י <WH328> le-'it-Ti, softly לְרֶ֨גֶל <WH7272> le-Re-gel according as הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <WH4399> ham-me-la-Chah the cattle אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- that לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> le-fa-Nai that goeth before me וּלְרֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> u-le-Re-gel be able to endure הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> hay-la-Dim, and the children עַ֛ד <WH5704> 'ad against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- I אָבֹ֥א <WH935> 'a-Vo until I come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> 'a-do-Ni unto my lord שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <WH8165> se-'I-rah. unto Seir

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav, And Esau אַצִּֽיגָה־ <WH3322> 'atz-tzi-gah- Let me now leave נָּ֣א <WH4994> na Please עִמְּךָ֔ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha, you מִן־ <WH4480> min- some הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am with thee [some] of the folk אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתִּ֑י <WH854> 'it-Ti; he וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer that [are] with me And he said לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah What זֶּ֔ה <WH2088> Zeh, me אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> 'em-tza- needeth it;let me find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> chen grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> 'a-do-Ni. of my lord

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shav returned בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom that day הַה֥וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav So Esau לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> le-dar-Ko on his way שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <WH8165> se-'I-rah. unto Seir

וְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ve-ya-'a-Ko And Jacob נָסַ֣ע <WH5265> na-Sa' journeyed סֻכֹּ֔תָה <WH5523> suk-Ko-tah, to Succoth וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven and built ל֖וֹ lo בָּ֑יִת <WH1004> Ba-yit; him an house וּלְמִקְנֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4735> u-le-mik-Ne-hu for his cattle עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah and made סֻכֹּ֔ת <WH5521> suk-Kot, booths עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> ken after that קָרָ֥א <WH7121> ka-Ra is called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> shem- therefore the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom of the place סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5523> suk-Kot. Succoth ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came יַעֲקֹ֨ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob שָׁלֵ֜ם <WH8003> sha-Lem safely עִ֣יר <WH5892> 'ir a city שְׁכֶ֗ם <WH7927> she-Chem, of Shechem אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz which [is] in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan בְּבֹא֖וֹ <WH935> be-vo-'O when he came מִפַּדַּ֣ן mip-pad-Dan אֲרָ֑ם <WH6307> 'a-Ram; from Padanaram וַיִּ֖חַן <WH2583> vai-Yi-chan and pitched his tent אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei before הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. the city

וַיִּ֜קֶן <WH7069> vai-Yi-ken And he bought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֶלְקַ֣ת <WH2513> chel-Kat a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh, of a field אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher he נָֽטָה־ <WH5186> na-tah- where he had spread שָׁם֙ <WH8033> sham in it אָהֳל֔וֹ <WH168> o-ho-Lo, his tent מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> mi-Yad at the hand בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children חֲמ֖וֹר <WH2544> cha-Mor of Hamor אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi father שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> she-Chem; Shechem's בְּמֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> be-me-'Ah for an hundred קְשִׂיטָֽה׃ <WH7192> ke-si-Tah. pieces of money

וַיַּצֶּב־ <WH5324> vai-yatz-tzev- And he erected שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> miz-Be-ach; there an altar וַיִּ֨קְרָא־ <WH7121> vai-Yik-ra- and called it ל֔וֹ lo, אֵ֖ל <WH410> 'el God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei angels יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. Israel ס sa-Mek
